id:
Crunchyroll




Aniplex Reveals Sword Art Online Alternative's English Dub Cast
Related Article
paragraph:
Aniplex of America unveiled the English cast for the Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online anime, which is coming to Hulu and Netflix in dubbed and subbed form. See who's jumping into each role in the full list below. LLENN: Reba Buhr Pitohui: Allegra Clark M: Ray Chase Fukaziroh: Faye Mata Eva (Boss) / Saki Nitobe: Cindy RobinsonRoza / Shiroi Noguchi: Rebecca DavisToma / Milana Sidorova: Kira BucklandSophie / Kana Fujisawa: Wendee LeeTanya / Risa Kusonoki: Morgan BerryAnna / Moe Annaka: Xanthe HuynhDavid: Greg ChunClarence: Laura StahlShirley: Jeannie TiradoEnglish Adaptation Writer & ADR Director: Alex von David You can watch Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online right now on Crunchyroll. -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine. You can read his webcomic, BIG DUMB FIGHTING IDIOTS at subhumanzoids. Follow him on Twitter @Moldilox.
